attributes.action: Replace all trees on publicly owned land with fruit trees.
attributes.background: By replacing all trees on public land with fruit trees we can provide a ready supply of fresh fruit for everybody. Fruit would be free to anybody who wants it.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament does not own all public land. Some public land will be owned by local councils, in those cases, it would be a decision for local councils to take.
